trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Workflow events are associated with a workflow instance.
A WorkflowEventArgs contains the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with the workflow event.
trans-unit.target: Een WorkflowEventArgs bevat de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>die zijn gekoppeld aan de werkstroom-gebeurtenis.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: A WorkflowEventArgs or an object that derives from the WorkflowEventArgs class provides the data for all of the workflow events in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> class.
trans-unit.target: Een WorkflowEventArgs of een object dat is afgeleid van de klasse WorkflowEventArgs biedt de gegevens voor alle van de werkstroomgebeurtenissen in de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>klasse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: WorkflowEventArgs is the base class for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowEventArgs is de basisklasse voor <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs>, en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowSuspendedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow instance associated with the workflow event.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee haalt u het workflowexemplaar gekoppeld aan de werkstroom-gebeurtenis.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"></xref> associated with the workflow event.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance"> </xref> die zijn gekoppeld aan de werkstroom-gebeurtenis.
